text: ai hamaare paalane vaale maine tere muaziz (ijzat vaale) ghar (kaabe) ke paas ek bekhetee ke (veeraan) biyaabaan (makka) mein apanee kuchh aulaad ko (laakar) basaaya hai taaki ai hamaare paalane vaale ye log baraabar yahaan namaaz padha karen to too kuchh logon ke dilon ko unakee taraph mael kar (taaki vah yahaan aakar aabaad hon) aur unhen tarah tarah ke phalon se rozee ata kar taaki ye log (tera) shukr karen
